description:
Toudou Shimako is http://anidb.net/ch1196 [Satou Sei]`s petite sœur at the beginning of the story and her successor later. Underneath her quiet, mannerly exterior lies a surprisingly strong resolve, calm personality and thoughtfulness.
During http://anidb.net/ch1193 [Sachiko]`s initial attempt to perform the sœur ritual on http://anidb.net/ch1192 [Yumi] in front of the entire student council body, Shimako was the only one who considered Yumi`s feelings of being forced to be one, and was brave enough to voice it out.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Toudou Shimako
